Docs.summary: Constants for the contacts table, which contains a record per aggregate of raw contacts representing the same person.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.IO.Stream OpenContactPhotoInputStream (Android.Content.ContentResolver cr, Android.Net.Uri contactUri);
.method public static hidebysig class System.IO.Stream OpenContactPhotoInputStream(class Android.Content.ContentResolver cr, class Android.Net.Uri contactUri) cil managed
static member OpenContactPhotoInputStream : Android.Content.ContentResolver * Android.Net.Uri -> System.IO.Stream

Docs.param: The content resolver to use for querying
the contact whose photo should be used. This can be used with either a P:Android.Provider.ContactsContract+Contacts.ContentUri or a P:Android.Provider.ContactsContract+Contacts.ContentLookupUri URI.
Docs.summary: Opens an InputStream for the contacts's thumbnail photo and returns the photo as a byte stream.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.IO.Stream OpenContactPhotoInputStream (Android.Content.ContentResolver cr, Android.Net.Uri contactUri, bool preferHighres);
.method public static hidebysig class System.IO.Stream OpenContactPhotoInputStream(class Android.Content.ContentResolver cr, class Android.Net.Uri contactUri, bool preferHighres) cil managed
static member OpenContactPhotoInputStream : Android.Content.ContentResolver * Android.Net.Uri * bool -> System.IO.Stream

Docs.param: The content resolver to use for querying
the contact whose photo should be used. This can be used with either a P:Android.Provider.ContactsContract+Contacts.ContentUri or a P:Android.Provider.ContactsContract+Contacts.ContentLookupUri URI.
If this is true and the contact has a higher resolution photo available, it is returned. If false, this function always tries to get the thumbnail
Docs.summary: Opens an InputStream for the contacts's photo and returns the photo as a byte stream.
